short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get URLs shortened for sharing everywhere

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Install this chrome extension to get shortened version of any URL which is convenient to share with others without looking like a long chain of incomprehensible texts.

It is also a bit more organized to save fixed size small URLs for referring to later.
The purpose of this tool is to get shortened URL for any long URL so it can also be called URL Shortner, Link Shortner or whatever you may like to call it but the best part is that it is available for free and it sits right next to the url bar in your Chrome Browser which makes it so easy to use. 

To make it even better, It can also pick the currently opened URL automatically making it easier to use.
